Fault.name: BPEL/ResignationProcess.sbpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpelx:subProcess> "ResignationProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/TransferProcess.sbpel

Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpelx:subProcess> "TransferProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.
